title: 4J：刚刚为PS3版做了一点小更新
author: kaho
txt_content:
4J Studios：A small update for #MinecraftPS3 is rolling out now. It adds a feature allowing save transfer of PS3 worlds for #MinecraftPS4.
4J Studios：我们刚刚对 #MinecraftPS3 版发布了一个小更新，并且已经推出了。【我们】添加了让PS3版本的世界更容易转移至 #MinecraftPS4。
